greeting.title:
Sakyawira 💍 Debbie
We are getting married!
greeting.message:
We are getting married.

To our dear ones who have always warmed us with their love.
We invite you to share the precious moment of our first step as a married couple.

mapInfo.address2: Jl. Achmad Adnawijaya No.132, Tegal Gundil, Kec. Bogor Utara, Kota Bogor, Jawa Barat 16152, Indonesia

locationInfo.title: 📍 Public Transport
locationInfo.desc:
👉🏻 From Bogor Station, take a commuter line train to Cilebut Station.
👉🏻 From Cilebut Station, take an angkot (public minivan) route 08 to Jl. Achmad Adnawijaya.
👉🏻 Walk 5 minutes to Duke & Duchess.

locationInfo.title: 📍 Parking Information
locationInfo.desc:
👉🏻 Free parking for 2 hours on floors 3-5 of the building
(Parking ticket can be received at the information desk)
